entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
